title: Developer Hours - WordPress Playground, Tue, May 23, 2023, 10:00 AM   | Meetup
body:
Skip to contentHomeLog inSign upEnglishStart a new groupChoose your locationStart a new groupEnglishLog inSign upChoose your locationDeveloper Hours - WordPress PlaygroundHosted ByMichael B. and 2 othersDetailsWouldn’t it be great if you could spin up a zero config instance of WordPress for testing, for demonstrations, and for collaborative reviews? Wouldn’t it be even better if it could be spun up instantly. And wouldn’t it be just awesome if this was available for free?
WordPress Playground is an exciting breakthrough that does all this and more. It runs WordPress in the browser without the need for PHP, Apache, or MySQL.
WordPress Playground is useful for:

Runnable code snippets in your documentation or course, or even blog posts
Plugin and theme demos in a private WordPress instance where the user is already logged in as admin
Easily switching PHP and WordPress version when testing
Replaying and fixing the failed CI tests right in the browser
… and so much more!

You can check out a live demo of WordPress Playground here: https://developer.wordpress.org/playground/demo/
In this presentation Adam Zielinski, a member of the development team that created WordPress Playground, will introduce this exciting new implementation and demonstrate it. He will also explain the technologies that make the magic happen, and run through a variety of scenarios and use cases.
Following the presentation there will be a Q&A giving you the opportunity to ask any questions you may have about WordPress Playground which Adam will be happy to answer.
Please note: this session will be recorded and the video published to WordPress.tv and YouTube. Participation in this session implies that you consent to the session being recorded and published.
This is an online event hosted over zoom.us.
